page.title: 18Hotel 70,Penmaenhead
page.content: The Hotel 70 degress is so called because the walls are all 70 degrees.The proprietors are Malcolm and Brenda Sexton.The hotel is in the 4 star category with first class service.The cost varies from Â£35 a night for a single room to Â£90 a night for a honeymoon suite.Also some rooms have jacuzzis. Children under 15 can stay for free in their parents room but a charge of 75% normal price is made for the child to have a separate room.There is a restaurant and a cocktail bar. The hotel even has its own helicopter to bring people from abroad or far away in the country.Many famous people have stayed at the hotel like Ken Dodd,Mike England and Anika Rice.
